{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergaß sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völcker-Historie, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> <YEAR>1725</YEAR>. <VOLUME>4. II. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> † <AUTHOR>Cattenburg</AUTHOR></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"Fixed the following issues:
1. Corrected Unicode escape sequences for umlauts and special characters (ß for \u221a\u00fc, ö for \u221a\u2202, ä for \u221a\u00a7, etc.)
2. Changed "1I" to "II" in the volume notation (likely OCR error)
3. Changed PRIZE tag to AUTHOR tag for "Cattenburg" (contextually this is an author name)
4. Closed the unclosed second BIBL tag after FORMAT 4.
5. Changed FORMAT "8\u221a\u2264" to "8°" (standard bibliographic notation for octavo)
6. Changed FORMAT "8v\u221a\u2264" to "8°" in two instances
7. Corrected author names "Gottschedens" and "B\u221a\u2202dickers" to "Gottschedens" and "Bödickers""}

parsed.explanation:
Fixed the following issues:
1. Corrected Unicode escape sequences for umlauts and special characters (ß for \u221a\u00fc, ö for \u221a\u2202, ä for \u221a\u00a7, etc.)
2. Changed "1I" to "II" in the volume notation (likely OCR error)
3. Changed PRIZE tag to AUTHOR tag for "Cattenburg" (contextually this is an author name)
4. Closed the unclosed second BIBL tag after FORMAT 4.
5. Changed FORMAT "8\u221a\u2264" to "8°" (standard bibliographic notation for octavo)
6. Changed FORMAT "8v\u221a\u2264" to "8°" in two instances
7. Corrected author names "Gottschedens" and "B\u221a\u2202dickers" to "Gottschedens" and "Bödickers"
